verses.text: And the angel that talked with me came again, and waked me, as a man that is wakened out of his sleep,

and said unto me, What seest thou? And I said, I have looked, and behold, a candlestick all of gold, with a bowl upon the top of it, and his seven lamps thereon, and seven pipes to the seven lamps, which \add were\add* upon the top thereof:
and two olive trees by it, one upon the right \add side\add* of the bowl, and the other upon the left \add side\add* thereof.
So I answered and spake to the angel that talked with me, saying, What \add are\add* these, my lord?
Then the angel that talked with me answered and said unto me, Knowest thou not what these \add be?\add* And I said, No, my lord.
Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This \add is\add* the word of the \sc Lord\sc* unto Zerubbabel, saying, Not by might, nor by power, but by my spirit, Saith the \sc Lord\sc* of hosts.

Who \add art\add* thou, O great mountain? before Zerubbabel \add thou shalt\add* become a plain: And he shall bring forth the headstone \add thereof with\add* shoutings, \add crying\add*, Grace, grace unto it.
Moreover the word of the \sc Lord\sc* came unto me, saying,
The hands of Zerubbabel have laid the foundation of this house; His hands shall also finish \add it;\add* And thou shalt know that the \sc Lord\sc* of hosts hath sent me unto you.

For who hath despised the day of small \add things?\add* For they shall rejoice, and shall see the plummet in the hand of Zerubbabel \add with\add* those seven; They \add are\add* the eyes of the \sc Lord\sc*, which run to and fro through the whole earth.
Then answered I, and said unto him, What \add are\add* these two olive trees upon the right \add side\add* of the candlestick and upon the left \add side\add* thereof?
And I answered again, and said unto him, What \add be these\add* two olive branches which through the two golden pipes empty the golden \add oil\add* out of themselves?
And he answered me and said, Knowest thou not what these \add be?\add* And I said, No, my lord.
Then said he, These \add are\add* the two anointed ones, that stand by the Lord of the whole earth.
